articles.title: Video Analysis with OCI Vision AI Services & Oracle AI Database 26ai
articles.description: AI-driven video analysis is no longer limited to complex, high-cost solutions. With Oracle AI Vision Service, developers can harness pre-built machine learning models to analyze videos, detect objects & text, identify scenes, and extract metadata—all through simple, scalable APIs.

articles.title: Create a Streamlit Python and ReactJS Oracle AI Database Applications for CRUD operations
articles.description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Building a Full-Stack Application. In this article, we'll take you on a journey to build a full-stack application using Oracle Cloud, React.js, and Streamlit. We'll cover everything from setting up the Cockpit web console and monitoring invalid login attempts to creating a simple Streamlit application for CRUD operations on a Customers table.

articles.title: How to Install Oracle AI Database 26ai & 23ai on OCI
articles.description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Installation and Setup. This article provides a comprehensive walkthrough on setting up Oracle Database 23ai Free & Oracle AI Database 26ai from scratch. From creating a Compute Instance and configuring your network to installing SQL Developer and connecting to your database, we'll guide you through every step of the process.
